response.overview: Masta B, Lothar Methouse and John-e put on tracks, that make crowds escalate and let them dive into a world of deep tunes. Despite many obstacles caused by the economic crisis an independent group of DJs overcomes the struggle with creative resistance. The three friends never stop to produce sets of electronic, funk and world music. After being shut down, the nights in their bar Crew Hassan turn back to normality and fresh adventures appear on the horizon. Underground Serenade follows the musicians through their daily life of searching for the perfect track while facing a challenging reality.
response.title: Underground Serenade
